name: OCG SMC308
//: Somewhat like sawn-off Mosin AKA Obrez, except factory standard and burst capable
description: Stockless Marksman Carbine, the first gun among OmniCorp products, is a selective-fire "sidearm" which shares magazines with sniper rifles. Includes critically needed gyroscopic stabilizer.
//1: Like in the AKS-74U, the round remains lethal beyond the effective range but extremely unlikely to hit anything. This modifier doesn't matter much because the high dispersion makes firing it at long ranges wasteful.
